statement.tex: \text{Find the values of x, y, z if the matrix }\\ A = \left[\begin{array}{ccc} 0 & 2y & z \\ x & y & -z \\ x & -y & z \end{array} \right]\\ \text{satisfies the equation }A'A =I

step.context: \text{What is the transpose of matrix A?}
step.tex: A' = \left[\begin{array}{ccc} 0 & x & x \\ 2y & y & -y \\ z & -z & z \end{array} \right]
A' = \left[\begin{array}{ccc} x & -y & z \\ x & y & -z \\ 0 & 2y & z \end{array} \right]
step.reason: A' \text{ or } A^{T} \text{ is the matrix obtained by}\\ \text{interchanging rows and columns of }A\\ \text{i.e. } [\;a_{ij}\;] \leftrightarrow [\;a_{ji}\;]

step.tex: A'A = \left[\begin{array}{ccc} 0 & 2xy & xz \\ 2yx & y^2 & yz \\ zx & yz & z^2 \end{array} \right]

step.context: \text{Using the equation A'A = I, what are the}\\ \text{values of x, y and z?}
step.reason: \text{Both positive and negative square roots are to}\\ \text{be considered.}
